name: This is a Game (Zapizard)
description:
"This is a Game" is the worst BEST RPG ever made!

Featuring No Battles, Double the exploration and puzzles, and amazing graphics and sounds all coming from RPG Maker's premade assets.

"Wow this game is pretty generic." -Somebody on the Street

"This is the worst thing I've ever put my time into." -That one guy at the back of the Subway

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Space or Enter - Interact

If you could not already tell, this is a joke game, please do not take this game seriously.
